prompt.task_guidelines:
You are an expert at identifying duplicate products from online product catalogs.
Your job is to tell if the two given entities are duplicates or not duplicates.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Whether the two entities are duplicates or not duplicates

few_shot_examples.Title_entity1: lexmark extra high yield return pgm print cartridge - magenta
few_shot_examples.Title_entity2: lexmark 18c1428 return program print cartridge black
few_shot_examples.label: not duplicate

few_shot_examples.Title_entity1: edge tech proshot 4gb sdhc class 6 memory card
few_shot_examples.Title_entity2: 4gb edge proshot sdhc memory card class6
few_shot_examples.label: duplicate
